name: skirbys_world
description: Skirbys World - A 2D platformer game built with HTML5 Canvas

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:validate
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p docs && cp -r src docs/ && cp -r public docs/ && cp game.html docs/game.html && cp landing.html docs/index.html && cp IMG_2133.jpeg docs/ && cp LICENSE docs/ && cp README.md docs/ && npm run build:timestamps
scripts.build:timestamps: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const now = new Date(); const buildDate = now.toISOString().split('T')[0] + ' ' + now.toTimeString().split(' ')[0]; const timestamp = Date.now(); let content = fs.readFileSync('docs/index.html', 'utf8'); content = content.replace(/{{ BUILD_TIMESTAMP }}/g, timestamp).replace(/{{ BUILD_DATE }}/g, buildDate); fs.writeFileSync('docs/index.html', content);"
scripts.build:validate: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const files = ['docs/index.html', 'docs/game.html', 'docs/src/player.js', 'docs/public/game.js']; files.forEach(f => { if (!fs.existsSync(f)) { console.error('Build validation failed: Missing', f); process.exit(1); } }); console.log('✅ Build validation passed: All required files exist');"
scripts.test: echo "Running game validation tests..." && npm run test:validate && npm run test:deployment
scripts.test:validate: node -e "console.log('Game validation: All external dependencies (Tailwind CSS, Tone.js) are loaded via CDN and should be accessible.');"
scripts.test:deployment: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); console.log('Deployment test: Checking modular structure...'); const modules = ['src/player.js', 'src/platforms.js', 'src/boss.js']; modules.forEach(m => { if (!fs.existsSync(m)) { console.error('❌ Missing module:', m); process.exit(1); } }); console.log('✅ All game modules present for deployment');"
scripts.lint: echo "No linting configured for this HTML/JS game."

author: Tim Burns
